content.rendered: Dr. Reema Shah is the Clinical Lead at Pinky Promise and she is responsible for ensuring and overseeing clinical excellence in the company’s healthcare undertakings. She specializes in concerns of Hormonal Imbalance, Menstrual Irregularities & PCOS and has vast experience in Obstetrics & Gynaecology with over 7 years at various hospitals and institutions in India like Jaslok Hospital, SRCC Hospital, Hinduja healthcare, Wadia Maternity, and RN Cooper. She is also the founder of Iracaim, a clinical practice focused on PCOS & Hormonal well-being. She received her M.B.B.S. from the Maharashtra Institute Of Medical Education & Research and her Post Graduation Degree from the Nowrosjee Wadia Maternity Hospital.
